titleStmt.title: Against the detestable masse, and more then abhominable popishe heresie Translated out of French into Englishe. Articles moste certain and true. 1566. Perused and allowed, accordyng vnto the Quenes Maieiesties [sic] iniunccions.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Against the detestable popishe masse.
Identified as STC 17626a on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
